files.patch:
@@ -2155,0 +2155,7 @@ + + /** + * Outputs this date into {@code StringBuilder}, such as {@code 2007-12-03}. + *

+ * The output will be in the ISO-8601 format {@code uuuu-MM-dd}. + * @param buf + */

@@ -1639,0 +1639,16 @@ + /** + * Outputs this time into {@code StringBuilder}, such as {@code 10:15}. + *

+ * The output will be one of the following ISO-8601 formats: + *

    + *
  • {@code HH:mm}
    • + *
  • {@code HH:mm:ss}
    • + *
  • {@code HH:mm:ss.SSS}
    • + *
  • {@code HH:mm:ss.SSSSSS}
    • + *
  • {@code HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSSSS}
    • + *
+ * The format used will be the shortest that outputs the full value of + * the time where the omitted parts are implied to be zero. + * + * @param buf + */ @@ -1645,1 +1661,1 @@ - .append(minuteValue < 10 ? ":0" : ":").append(minuteValue); + .append(minuteValue < 10 ? ":0" : ":").append(minuteValue);
